snippet.name: cfUniForm Standard Input Tag
snippet.help: Inserts a cfUniForm standard input (form field) tag
snippet.starttext: <uform:field label="$${Label}" name="$${Field Name}" isRequired="$${Required?:yes|no}" type="$${Field Type:text|textarea|select|radio|checkbox|password}" value="$${Value}" hint="$${Hint}" />
